title: AWS Lambda to Amazon SQS
description: The SAM template deploys a Lambda function, an SQS queue and the IAM permissions required to run the application. The Lambda function publishes a message to the SQS queue when invoked.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The Lambda function publishes a message to the SQS queue when invoked.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.headline: Presented by Daniele Frasca
authors.name: Daniele Frasca
authors.bio: I am Daniele Frasca serverless enthusiast. I build and architect serverless applications at scale.
